title: Google’s ADK Is a New Open Source Framework for Building Multiagent Systems
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Google today launched the Agent Development Kit (ADK), a new open source framework for building multiagent systems.
cntitle: Google 的 ADK 是一个用于构建多智能体系统的新开源框架
cndescription: 今天，Google 发布了 Agent Development Kit (ADK)，这是一个用于构建多代理系统的全新开源框架。
